content.raw:
# Prerequisites

* [X] Put an X between the brackets on this line if you have done all of the following:
    * Checked the Q&A board for common solutions: http://answers.gazebosim.org
    * Checked that your issue isn't already filed.
    * Checked that there is not already an Ignition package that provides the described functionality: https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs

# Description 

Windows build fails:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_sensors-ign-1-win/5

~~~
CameraSensor.obj : error LNK2001:
 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: __cdecl
 ignition::sensors::v1::SensorTypePlugin<class ignition::sensors::v1::CameraSensor>::SensorTypePlugin<class ignition::sensors::v1::CameraSensor>(void)" 
~~~

~~~
GpuLidarSensor.obj : error LNK2001:
 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: __cdecl
 ignition::sensors::v1::SensorTypePlugin<class ignition::sensors::v1::GpuLidarSensor>::SensorTypePlugin<class ignition::sensors::v1::GpuLidarSensor>(void)" 
~~~

~~~
LogicalCameraSensor.obj : error LNK2001:
 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: __cdecl
 ignition::sensors::v1::SensorTypePlugin<class ignition::sensors::v1::LogicalCameraSensor>::SensorTypePlugin<class ignition::sensors::v1::LogicalCameraSensor>(void)" 
~~~
# Steps to Reproduce

1. Build on windows

**Expected behavior:**  

Builds successfully

**Actual behavior:**

Fails to build

**Reproduces how often:** 

100%

# Versions

ign-sensors1 branch on windows

# Additional Information

Prerequisites

  • [X] Put an X between the brackets on this line if you have done all of the following:
    • Checked the Q&A board for common solutions: http://answers.gazebosim.org
    • Checked that your issue isn't already filed.
    • Checked that there is not already an Ignition package that provides the described functionality: https://ignitionrobotics.org/libs

Description

Windows build fails:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_sensors-ign-1-win/5
CameraSensor.obj : error LNK2001:
 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: __cdecl
 ignition::sensors::v1::SensorTypePlugin<class ignition::sensors::v1::CameraSensor>::SensorTypePlugin<class ignition::sensors::v1::CameraSensor>(void)" 

GpuLidarSensor.obj : error LNK2001:
 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: __cdecl
 ignition::sensors::v1::SensorTypePlugin<class ignition::sensors::v1::GpuLidarSensor>::SensorTypePlugin<class ignition::sensors::v1::GpuLidarSensor>(void)" 

LogicalCameraSensor.obj : error LNK2001:
 unresolved external symbol "__declspec(dllimport) public: __cdecl
 ignition::sensors::v1::SensorTypePlugin<class ignition::sensors::v1::LogicalCameraSensor>::SensorTypePlugin<class ignition::sensors::v1::LogicalCameraSensor>(void)"

Steps to Reproduce

  1. Build on windows

Expected behavior:

Builds successfully

Actual behavior:

Fails to build

Reproduces how often:

100%

Versions

ign-sensors1 branch on windows

Additional Information
